video_cover_url.description: URL for the cover image of the video.

preview_url_expire_time.description: Timestamp when the preview URL expires.

duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds.

height.description: Height of the video in pixels.

width.description: Width of the video in pixels.

signature.description: Signature for authenticating the video request.

size.description: Size of the video file in bytes.

allowed_placements.description: List of placements where the video can be used.

items.description: Specific placement where the video is allowed.

allow_download.description: Indicates if the video can be downloaded by users.

create_time.description: Timestamp when the video was created.

modify_time.description: Timestamp when the video was last modified.

displayable.description: Indicates if the video is displayable.
